description.plain:
Kiesa Rae Ellestad, born 16 January 1989, is better known as Kiesza. She’s a Canadian singer and multi-instrumentalist from Calgary.

Kiesza took part in the Young Canadians, performing tap and jazz dancing, as well as theatre. She’s also trained as a ballerina, however, a knee injury at age 15 ended her ballet career. When Ellestad was 18, she says that her parents' divorce caused her to write her first song, as a way of expressing her feelings. The same year, she heard a song of hers played on the radio.

body.plain:
Kiesa Rae Ellestad, born 16 January 1989, is better known as Kiesza. She’s a Canadian singer and multi-instrumentalist from Calgary.

Kiesza took part in the Young Canadians, performing tap and jazz dancing, as well as theatre. She’s also trained as a ballerina, however, a knee injury at age 15 ended her ballet career. When Ellestad was 18, she says that her parents' divorce caused her to write her first song, as a way of expressing her feelings. The same year, she heard a song of hers played on the radio.

songs.title: Hideaway

description.plain:
“Hideaway” is the first single of Canadian artist Kiesza. It has charted at #1 in the UK.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ESXgJ9-H-2U

33 ContributorsHideaway Lyrics[Produced by Kiesza and Rami Samir Afuni]

songs.full_title: Bad Thing by Kiesza (Ft. Joey Bada$$)
songs.title: Bad Thing

description.plain: Kiesza steps away from the house style she has become synonymous to so far in her career, and delivers a more smooth sounding Pop/R&b track with the assistance of the Beast Coast’s finest, Joey BADA$$. The record is grimy, and a taste of her debut album Sound of a Woman, out on October 21st with one other feature from Mick Jenkins.
